channel.title: git on Thoughts, Views & More...
channel.description: Recent content in git on Thoughts, Views & More...

item.title: Some quick and useful git commands
item.description: Using git is somehow easier when you just stick into normal workflow or working all alone in a project. Also it is easier as there are many GUI available. But there are some possibility on falling into critical situations where GUI may not be the right tool to stick with. I will share some situations here and the right commands which will save you from doing useless commits.

item.title: Some git tips to survive in versioning world â€“ Part 1
item.description: I am gonna talk about Git. We all somehow use git and thus it is important for us to better use .gitignore.
